body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha "Patsy" Riley Gritton in Mercer County, Kentucky, in November 1830. Father of William Gritton, George Gritton, Jackson Gritton, Merritt Gritton, Lucretia Gritton, Elizabeth Gritton, Thomas Gritton, Levi H. Gritton, Calvin Gritton, Martha E. Gritton. Resident of Washington County in 1850. Farmer in Washington County in 1860.
